alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 10:33AM CST until February 23 at 6:51AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Meramec River near Steelville. Big River at Byrnesville. Meramec River near Sullivan. Kaskaskia River at Vandalia. Black River near Annapolis. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kaskaskia River at Vandalia. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Agricultural levee begins to be slightly overtopped. No residences are affected at this level. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 21.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CST Friday was 21.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23.5 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Kaskaskia River Vandalia 18.0 21.5 Fri 10 am 23.3 23.4 21.6 17.1 13.7 &&
